I am not sure if this was an Amazon error or the company's issue but I ordered one in the black print that I thought was animal print judging from the listing photo as well as a blue floral one. I returned the black one because it was some God awful abstract print in brown, harvest gold and white AND because there was a huge 12"+ tear down the right had side seam under the armpit. It was packaged like someone had worn and returned it. I was VERY disappointed and disgusted.  The blue floral one is wearble. It's a lightweight fabric with no lining and I feel kind of like I'm wearing a very cheap top...I feel like I'm poor and someone took pity on me whenever I wear it. It just....I don't know. I don't like it. I wear it because I need clothes for work but I've ordered other tops to go with the pants I originally purchased this top to wear with because I just don't like how broke and junky this top makes me feel.  Just....don't buy any of them. They're just not worth it.

评论概述: Stylish and versatile boho floral blouse
评论详情: I recently purchased the Large 'sky blue' boho floral blouse, and I couldn't be happier. At 5 feet 8 inches and 175 pounds, it fits me perfectly and is incredibly comfortable. The fabric is soft and breathable, ideal for various occasions.  This blouse is versatile -I love wearing it tucked in for a polished look or untucked for a relaxed vibe (both pictured on the attached photos). The neckline strings add a charming touch, whether tied or left undone.  It pairs well with sporty bottoms and shoes for a casual look or with jeans and dressier shoes for a more put-together outfit. The vibrant sky blue color and floral pattern make me feel confident and stylish. Overall, this boho floral blouse is a fantastic addition to any wardrobe, perfect for various occasions and easily adaptable to different fashion preferences. Highly recommended!
This blouse is well made very nice fabric. High quality especially for the price. Looks very nice on. Love it!

I love the light and soft fabric, the colors are perfect to wear with many different options for bottoms. The sleeves add a feminine look. It washes well, doesn’t shrink, nor fade. True to size, but it has enough room to go down a size.
